# AI/ML Freelance Placement Platform

This is a Next.js 14 platform connecting AI/ML freelancers with clients through web dashboards and Telegram bot integration.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend:** Next.js 14 + TailwindCSS + TypeScript
- **Backend:** Supabase (Postgres DB + Auth + Storage)
- **Auth:** Supabase Auth (email login)
- **Integration:** Telegram Bot API
- **Hosting:** Vercel (frontend), Supabase (backend)

## Features
- Web dashboards for freelancers and clients
- Authentication and role-based access
- Job posting and application system
- Telegram bot integration for notifications
- Free-tier deployable stack

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all new files
- Follow Next.js 14 app router patterns
- Use Tailwind for styling
- Implement proper error handling
- Maintain responsive design
